name: Serenity Now
profile:
Serenity Now is a channel for anyone looking to improve their mental health, physical health and overall well being.  It is meant to bring encouragement and motivation through powerful informative videos.  
You will find a variety of high quality videos about health, love, relationships, psychology, motivation, self empowerment, educational information,  relaxation and others ways to improve yourself.  We aim to help you achieve the best version of you and your surroundings.  
  
I am an actual person located in the United States who writes and creates all of my videos.  This is a legitimate channel and I adhere to all YouTube guidelines and rules.  All suspicious comments and accounts will be blocked from this channel.  Otherwise, I would love to have you join me for each video and send me a comment.  Please Subscribe and remember to hit the Notifications button.
